title: TUTORIAL Miniature Crochet Teddy Bear Pattern 1:12 Scale, Amigurumi  | PDF + video
description: Create your own adorable miniature teddy bear with this detailed crochet pattern. Perfect for fans of amigurumi, miniature animals, and DIY collectible toys, this project lets you create an incredibly detailed bear in 1:12 scale — ideal for dollhouse scenes, dioramas, or as a unique handmade gift. Whether you’re a dollhouse enthusiast or an experienced crocheter looking for a delicate project, this bear will add warmth and personality to your collection. This listing include…
